abstract.t: The Layer 2 Tunneling Protocol ('L2TP') defines a mechanism fortunneling PPP sessions over arbitrary media. There exists a class ofservices for which different types of data packets should besegregated from each other, over the lower layer transport. Thisdocument describes the solution space addressed, its underlyingmotivations, and the protocol modifications required. Thisenhancement to the L2TP protocol is called L2TP Alternate DataChannel, or 'L2TPADC'.
